mapper.select: select id,keyword,url,is_not,add_time,update_time,delted from wanjia_keyword where delted = 0 and keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into wanjia_keyword(keyword, url, is_not, add_time, update_time, delted) values (#{keyword},#{url},#{isNot},#{addTime},#{updateTime},#{delted})
mapper.update: update wanjia_keyword set keyword = #{keyword}, url = #{url}, is_not = #{isNot}, add_time = #{addTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, delted = #{delted} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update wanjia_keyword set delted = 1 where id = #{id}
